componentDescription: A versatile component for displaying a list of interactive items in a popup, triggered by another element.

trigger.description: Defines the element that triggers the dropdown menu.

items.description: An array of items to be displayed within the dropdown menu.

size.description: Specifies the size of the dropdown menu.

variant.description: Determines the visual variant or style of the dropdown menu.

side.description: Controls the preferred side where the dropdown content opens relative to the trigger.

align.description: Sets the alignment of the dropdown content relative to the trigger.

defaultOpen.description: Indicates whether the dropdown menu should be open by default.

views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the dropdown menu.
